dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Asphalt seal; Pavement sealant; Tar seal; Road surface sealant; Bitumen waterproofing; Asphalt binder seal; Bituminous seal; Seal coat; Blacktop seal
Asphalt seal; Pavement sealant; Tar seal; Road surface sealant; Bitumen waterproofing; Asphalt binder seal; Bituminous seal; Seal coat; Blacktop seal
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow pertains to bitumen seal, categorized as a construction material used primarily in road surfacing. This includes its processing level to meet technical specifications, compliance with relevant standards, quality metrics, its application methods, sourcing of the crude oil for bitumen, and its preparation as a sealant. The description identifies whether the product is available as a mixture in the production phase or as a final consumable product, indicating the availability point such as 'to consumer' or 'at plant'. Details regarding each aspect are listed comprehensively and separated by commas.
该产品流程涉及沥青封层, 作为主要用于道路铺设的建筑材料。这包括它的加工水平以满足技术规格、符合相关标准的合规性、质量指标、其施工方法、来源于原油的沥青采购，以及其作为密封剂的准备工作。描述标识出产品是作为生产阶段的混合物提供还是作为最终消费产品提供，指示了诸如‘对消费者’或‘在工厂’等可获得的点。每个方面的细节均被全面列出并用逗号分隔。
